baseRule.text: 若比丘尼裸形露地洗浴。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 159

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼在有人處浴。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 189

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 21

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber nackt badet, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni bathe naked, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang mandi secara telanjang, itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，露身形，在河水、泉水、流水、池水中浴者，波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 101

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼以手相牽河中洗浴者。波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 171

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼裸形洗浴。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 81
